meanings.definition: The quality or state of being crude or unrefined.
meanings.sent1: The crudity of his manners was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She was taken aback by the crudity of his language.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crudity, he always made us laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The crudity of his behavior was like a slap in the face.
meanings.sent5: The crudity of the painting made it stand out among the others.
